sample.title: Welcome to My Website
sample.description: Explore our content in multiple languages.

Metadata.title: SaaStart | Auth0
Metadata.description: SaaStart is a reference B2B SaaS application built using Next.js and Auth0.

IndexPage.description_1: SaaStart is a reference B2B SaaS application built using Next.js and Auth0.
IndexPage.description_2: It features multi-tenancy support, user management and access controls, security policies, self-service Single Sign-On configuration and more out-of-the-box.

SignUpForm.title: Try SaaStart for Free
SignUpForm.description: Enter your email address to sign up and create a new organization for you and your collaborators.
SignUpForm.agreement: By continuing, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

WelcomeBackCard.title: Welcome Back!
WelcomeBackCard.description: You are currently logged in to SaaStart.

DashboardHome.title: Explore the SaaS Starter
DashboardHome.description_1: This reference app demonstrates how to build a multi-tenant B2B SaaS application powered by Auth0.
DashboardHome.description_2: Head over to the Settings Dashboard to explore common administrative capabilities like membership management, single sign-on configuration, and security policies.
DashboardHome.caution: (You must be logged in with an <admin>admin</admin> role in your organization.)

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.description_1: You’re currently logged in with the role of <role>{user_role, select, admin {Admin} member {Member} other {Unknown}}</role>.
unauthorized.description_2: Log in as an Organization member with the <admin>admin</admin> role to manage your Organization's settings.

Members.title: Members
Members.description: Manage the members of the organization.

InvitationsList.title: Pending Invitations
InvitationsList.description: Invitations that have been sent out but have not yet been redeemed.

CreateInvitationForm.title: Invite team members
CreateInvitationForm.description: Invite team members to join this organization using their email address.

ConnectionsList.title: Configured Connections
ConnectionsList.description: The currently active SSO connections for your organization.

table.caption: You have {count, plural, =0 {no configured connections yet} =1 {1 configured connection} other {# configured connections}}.

alert.title: Delete Connection {name}?
alert.description: This will permanently delete the connection and all users who have authenticated with it.

CreateOidcConnectionForm.title: Create an OIDC Connection
CreateOidcConnectionForm.description: Configure a new OpenID Connect connection for your organization.
CreateOidcConnectionForm.name: Connection Name

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: A space-separated list of scopes. Must contain <openid>openid</openid>.

domains.title: Domains
domains.alert: No domains have been added yet.

callback_url.title: Callback URL
callback_url.description: You may need to configure the OIDC issuer with the following callback URL:

enable.title: Enable Auto-Membership
enable.description: All users logging in with this connection will be automatically added as members of this organization.

disable.title: Disable Auto-Membership
disable.description: All users logging in with this connection will not be added as members to this organization.

createOidcConnection.failed_to_create: Failed to create the SSO connection.

deleteOidcConnection.failed_to_delete: Failed to delete the SSO connection.

CreateSamlConnectionForm.title: Create a SAML Connection
CreateSamlConnectionForm.description: Configure a new SAML connection for your organization.
CreateSamlConnectionForm.name: Connection Name

domains.title: Domains
domains.alert: No domains have been added yet.

sign_request.title: Sign Request
sign_request.description: The request will be signed with <rsa_sha256>RSA-SHA256</rsa_sha256>. <download>Download the certificate</download> to configure your identity provider to validate the request signature.

post_back_url.title: Post-Back URL
post_back_url.description: You will need to configure the SAML identity provider with the following post-back URL:

enable.title: Enable Auto-Membership
enable.description: All users logging in with this connection will be automatically added as members of this organization.

disable.title: Disable Auto-Membership
disable.description: All users logging in with this connection will not be added as members to this organization.

createSamlConnection.failed_to_create: Failed to create the SSO connection.

deleteSamlConnection.failed_to_delete: Failed to delete the SSO connection.

SecurityPolicies.title: Security Policies
SecurityPolicies.description: Manage the security policies of your organization.

MfaPolicyForm.title: Security Policies
MfaPolicyForm.description: Configure the MFA policies for your organization.

enforce_mfa.title: Enforce Multi-Factor Authentication
enforce_mfa.description: Users will be required to verify their identity with a second factor.

do_not_enforce.title: Do not enforce MFA for the following e-mail domains
do_not_enforce.description: Enter a comma-separated list of e-mail domains.

mfa_providers.title: Select which MFA providers your users are allowed to use

phone.title: Phone Message
phone.description: One time code via phone text messages.

otp.title: One-time Password
otp.description: OTP using Google Authenticator or similar.

MfaPolicyForm.success: The organization's MFA policy has been updated.

updateMfaPolicy.error: Failed to update the organization's MFA policy.

AccountDisplayNameForm.title: Display Name
AccountDisplayNameForm.description: Enter a name you would liked to have displayed to other users.
AccountDisplayNameForm.success: Your display name has been updated.

DeleteAccountForm.title: Delete Account
DeleteAccountForm.description: Permanently remove all profile data across all organizations you belong to.
DeleteAccountForm.warning: <warning>Warning:</warning> This action is immediate and cannot be undone.
DeleteAccountForm.success: Your account has been deleted and you will be logged out.

updateDisplayName.failed_to_update: Failed to update your display name.

MFAEnrollmentForm.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
MFAEnrollmentForm.description: Manage the MFA enrollments for your account.

sms.title: Phone Message
sms.description: Users will receive a phone message with a verification code

push_notification.title: Push Notification using Auth0 Guardian
push_notification.description: Provide a push notification using Auth0 Guardian.

otp.title: One-time Password
otp.description: Provide a one-time password using Google Authenticator or similar.

email.title: Email
email.description: Users will receive an email message containing a verification code.

duo.title: Duo Security
duo.description: Use your DUO account for Multi-factor Authentication.

webauthn_roaming.title: WebAuthn with FIDO Security Keys
webauthn_roaming.description: Depending on your browser, you can use WebAuthn-compliant security keys (like FIDO2) as a second factor of authentication.

webauthn_platform.title: WebAuthn with FIDO Device Biometrics
webauthn_platform.description: Depending on your browser, you can use WebAuthn-compliant device biometrics as a second factor of authentication

recovery_code.title: Recovery Code
recovery_code.description: Provide a unique code that allows users to regain access to their account.

createEnrollment.failed_to_create: Failed to create an enrollment ticket.

DisplayUserSession.title: User
DisplayUserSession.description: User session is displayed here for debugging.

Create.description_1: SaaStart is a reference B2B SaaS application built using Next.js and Auth0.
Create.description_2: It features multi-tenancy support, user management and access controls, security policies, self-service Single Sign-On configuration and more out-of-the-box.
